subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On Sept. 18, 2005, Greg Barnes spent $72 on the Chicago Bears’ potential to reach Super Bowl XLI from Ticketreserve.com, a futures Web site for tickets to big games.
snippet: On Sept. 18, 2005, Greg Barnes spent $72 on the Chicago Bears’ potential to reach Super Bowl XLI from Ticketreserve.com, a futures Web site for tickets to big games.
